channel.title: Name on A11y Ref
channel.description: Recent content in Name on A11y Ref

item.title: Name Test
item.description: What is ARIA? ARIA is a way for websites and web apps to communicate with screen readers. You can think of ARIA as an API for communicating information about an interactive HTML element / widget to a screen reader. What ARIA isn’t A programming language Magic What ARIA Communicates to Screen Readers labels and names roles states properties relationships live announcements Accessible Name Calculation Here is how the accessible name of an element is calculated:
